complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into framework setup, element implementation (health/power), aura system integration, castbar/portrait/threat implementation, and callback verification
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires deep understanding of oUF's API architecture, handling load order dependencies, implementing multiple complex elements with dynamic text tags, and testing various unit frame types. The integration of multiple visual components and event callbacks increases complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into font integration, texture implementation, sound system setup, and optimization phases
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves asset management across multiple formats, integration with LibSharedMedia, and optimization constraints. Requires handling different media types while maintaining performance limits, but follows established implementation patterns.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into UI layout, category implementation, real-time preview system, profile management, input controls (color pickers/sliders), and search/export functionality
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple nested categories, real-time preview requirements, profile management system, and integration with various UI elements. Demands robust state management and error handling for configuration options.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into main bar implementation, bottom bars, right bars, special purpose bars, and conflict resolution layer
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires managing 96+ buttons across multiple bars while avoiding conflicts with default UI. Involves complex layout management and ensuring proper keybind functionality across all action bar types.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into drag-and-drop system, coordinate controls, alignment tools, and layout persistence components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combines complex UI interactions (drag-and-drop) with precise mathematical calculations for scaling, spacing, and grid alignment. Requires handling multiple input methods and maintaining layout consistency.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into state detection engine, visibility rules engine, and fading animation system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires managing multiple overlapping visibility conditions and implementing smooth transitions. Complexity comes from handling numerous game state combinations without performance impact.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into display options, visual effects, color systems, and layout controls
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves implementing multiple visual customization options that must work together seamlessly. Requires handling different visual states and ensuring compatibility across various button skins.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into state detection system, page configuration engine, and override handling module
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Demands complex state machine implementation with multiple conditional layers. Must handle class-specific requirements and maintain visual consistency across different game modes.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into edit mode system, layout manipulation tools, history management, and visual feedback components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combines drag-and-drop complexity with real-time preview and state management. Requires implementing undo/redo functionality while maintaining performance for frequent updates.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into detection system, configuration engine, and preset application components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires intelligent configuration based on multiple factors (role, resolution, class). Needs to balance automation with user customization while maintaining clear UI flow.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into customization engine, grouping system, and priority management components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Demands granular control implementation while maintaining overall bar functionality. Requires efficient data management for individual button states without performance degradation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into automation engine, sorting system, visual indicators, and performance monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves implementing intelligent behavior that requires monitoring game state changes and player actions. Must balance automation with user control while maintaining performance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into profile storage, import/export system, and community integration components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires robust data serialization and management system with multiple access points. Complexity comes from handling different profile scopes and ensuring data integrity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into loading optimization, update efficiency, memory management, and performance monitoring components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple optimization techniques (lazy loading, frame pooling) and strict performance targets. Requires deep understanding of WoW's performance characteristics.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into frame types, element system, filtering engine, performance optimization, and class-specific handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Extremely complex due to multiple frame types with shared and unique requirements. Demands efficient resource management while implementing advanced features like smart buff filtering.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into nameplate framework, customization system, threat detection, and performance optimization
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires handling dynamic in-combat elements with strict performance constraints. Implementation must balance customization with game engine limitations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into buff/debuff system, resource tracking, and visual indicator components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity from implementing multiple visual indicators with different triggers. Requires efficient filtering and display logic without automation features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into theme framework, component system, import/export, and live switching implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity from managing multiple visual components that must work together. Requires implementing theme persistence and seamless switching without UI reload.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into shape system, tracking features, and position management components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity from implementing multiple visual and functional enhancements while maintaining compatibility with existing minimap elements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into bag framework, search system, categorization engine, and bank integration components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to integrating multiple bag-related features into a unified interface while maintaining performance and implementing intelligent sorting systems.
